sentence.Network_en: He surrendered himself to dispair and committed suicide.
Don't dispair as the nicest things will happen when least expected!
sentence.Network_cn: 因为最好的事情都会在最少企盼的时候碰巧发生!

sentence.Network_en: Don't dispair, the nicest things will happen to you when you least expect them.
sentence.Network_cn: 别气馁, 因为最好的事情都会在你最少企盼它们的时候碰巧发生.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
